description:
This course is designed to teach students the fundamentals of software testing. This is a quick start course in software testing for people just getting into the field, or for people who just need a refresher course to polish their testing skills.

Why should you take this course?

Over the last few years the profile of software tester has undergone tremendous changes. Testing has created several levels and types and specialization in these various types of testing has increased the intrinsic value of a software tester. Several career options have evolved in front of the testing community. Of late, testing is looked after as a good professional career for many of the aspiring youths. For example, from being test engineer one can move to senior test engineer, test lead to test manager; else can become QA lead, QA Manager. Thus we see that the options available in the testing domain are huge.There is always the demand for good performance testers who can analyze the performance test results, identify the bottlenecks and suggest tuning techniques.

What does the course offer?

Basics of Software Testing course will help you to understand software testing from the scratch and will help you become more comfortable in testing software testing application at various levels like unit, integration, system, and user acceptance. You will learn the terminology, process, and challenges of testing in the real world.

Is software testing your career goal?

Join us if you want to learn software testing from the scratch. We have designed this software testing training course to master software testing fundamentals that goes a long way in making a successful career in testing domain.

Key highlights of the course:

    ·Comprehensive content, developed by industry experts

    ·Easy to understand course material, supplemented with demonstrations

    ·Highly interactive
title: Basics of Software Testing
